courses.name: Independent Research I - G/T
courses.description: Independent Research is a college-level course in which students design an original research study or creative production in self-selected areas of interest. Students learn advanced-level research methodologies and college-level writing and oral presentation skills. Under the guidance of the G/T resource teacher

courses.name: Independent Research II - G/T
courses.description: Independent Research II is a second-level course for students wishing to continue their research or creative production. Students learn advanced-level research methodologies and college-level writing and oral presentation skills. Under the guidance of the G/T resource teacher
courses.prerequisites: Independent Research I - G/T and teacher recommendations

courses.name: Independent Research III - G/T
courses.description: Independent Research III is a third-level course for students wishing to continue their research or creative production. Students learn advanced-level research methodologies and college-level writing and oral presentation skills. Under the guidance of the G/T resource teacher
courses.prerequisites: Independent Research II - G/T and teacher recommendations
